abilities.name: Anomalous Burst
abilities.description: Shoot a flurry of &type="bold_it"col="C45860"6 (+1 per 30 &img="misc_big,34") heat seeking void blasts&reset, dealing &type="bold_it"&col="FF6C32"750 (+75%&space&img="misc_big,32") Physical Damage.

abilities.name: Paradoxical Shift
abilities.description: Become a &type="med_it"Phantom&reset for the next 3 seconds, becoming Invisible to enemies and gaining &type="bold_it"&col="C45860"+25% &img="misc_big,34".

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description:
&type="bold"&col="7A6D6A"PASSIVE:&reset Enemies killed near the Enigma leave behind a &type="med_it"Soul Fragment&reset for 5 seconds.
&type="bold"&col="7A6D6A"ACTIVE:&reset Convert all &type="med_it"Soul Fragments&reset within 2 tiles of your cursor into Voidlings. Voidlings chase the closest enemy, attacking them for &type="bold_it"&col="A15AFF"250 (+150% &img="misc_big,35") damage.&reset
Voidlings have &type="bold_it"&col="20AC20"600 (+25% &img="misc_big,40") Maximum Health&reset, and lose 75 health every second.
&type="med_it"&size="10"&col="736562"Soul Fragments are shared between all Enigmas in the same instance.

abilities.name: Shapeshift
abilities.description: Transform into another chosen class, granting access to their abilities.

abilities.name: Anomalous Burst
abilities.description: Shoot a flurry of &type="bold_it"col="C45860"6 (+1 per 30 &img="misc_big,34") heat seeking void blasts&reset, dealing &type="bold_it"&col="FF6C32"750 (+75%&space&img="misc_big,32") Physical Damage.

abilities.description: Become a &type="med_it"Phantom&reset for the next 3 seconds, becoming Invisible to enemies and gaining &type="bold_it"&col="C45860"+25% &img="misc_big,34".

abilities.description:
&type="bold"&col="7A6D6A"PASSIVE:&reset Enemies killed near the Enigma leave behind a &type="med_it"Soul Fragment&reset for 5 seconds.
&type="bold"&col="7A6D6A"ACTIVE:&reset Convert all &type="med_it"Soul Fragments&reset within 2 tiles of your cursor into Voidlings. Voidlings chase the closest enemy, attacking them for &type="bold_it"&col="A15AFF"250 (+150% &img="misc_big,35") damage.&reset

&type="med_it"&size="10"&col="736562"Soul Fragments are shared between all Enigmas in the same instance.

abilities.name: Shapeshift
abilities.description: Transform into another chosen class, granting access to their abilities.

abilities.name: Time Dilation
abilities.description: All enemies and projectiles within &type="bold_it"&col="A15AFF"4 (+6%&space&img="misc_big,35")&reset tiles of you move 30% slower for &type="bold_it"&col="6080FF"10 (+12% &img="misc_big,59")&reset seconds.

abilities.name: Rewind
abilities.description: Rewind time by &type="bold_it"&col="FFE770"3 (&col="6080FF"+6% &img="misc_big,59", &col="1C40FF"+6% &img="misc_big,39", &col="A15AFF"+6%&space&img="misc_big,35"&col="FFE770")&reset seconds, causing you to return to your old position and Health. (if higher than current)

abilities.name: Null Pulse
abilities.description: Destroy all enemy projectiles within &type="bold_it"&col="6080FF"3 (+12% &img="misc_big,59")&reset tiles, causing the enemies that created them to take &type="bold_it"&col="A15AFF"5 (+6% &img="misc_big,35")&reset times the damage.

abilities.name: Time Lock
abilities.description:
Become immune to damage, unable to move, shoot and use abilities for &type="bold_it"&col="6080FF"15 (+12% &img="misc_big,59")&reset seconds, storing all damage taken. 
Return double the damage stored as a Magic Damage blast within &type="bold_it"&col="6080FF"9 (+6%&space&img="misc_big,59")&reset tiles after this effect ends.
&type="med_it"&size="10"&col="736562"Damage is capped at &type="bold_it"&col="A15AFF"30000 (+1000% &img="misc_big,35")&reset.

abilities.name: Equivalent Exchange
abilities.description: Make your other abilities cost 8% (+8% HST) less for every 1700 damage dealt after 8 seconds. This includes the hit cost of Premium Protection.

abilities.name: Asset Bubble
abilities.description:
Deal 4.4% more damage per 10000 Gold you own for 8 seconds.
After this effect ends, deal 8.8% less damage per 10000 Gold you own for 17 seconds.
The damage buff is capped at 44%, while the debuff is capped at 88%.

abilities.name: Premium Protection
abilities.description:
Become immune to damage for &type="bold_it"&col="C45860"8 (+8%&space&img="misc_big,58")&reset seconds, but pay &type="bold_it"&col="FFE770"2 Gold&reset for every damage point you would've taken.
&type="med_it"&size="10"&col="736562"This effect only applies to bullets that you can pay for.

abilities.name: Compound Interest
abilities.description:
Gain the following until this ability is recast:
  - &type="bold_it"&col="FFE770"+280% (&col="D65BFF"-8% &img="misc_big,57", &col="FF9670"-8% &img="misc_big,33"&col="FFE770") Damage Taken&reset
  - &type="bold_it"&col="C45860"-17% &img="misc_big,34"&reset
   - &type="bold_it"All damage dealt now accumulates Drop Chance, at a rate of &col="C45860"0.8% (+0.8% &img="misc_big,58")&reset&type="bold_it" per 8000 damage dealt.&reset
Recasting this ability removes the debuffs, sets it on cooldown, charges the Gold cost again and grants you the accumulated Drop Chance for &type="bold_it"&col="FFE770"35&reset seconds.
Currently accumulated Drop Chance: &type="bold_it"&col="FFE770"{0}%
&type="med_it"&size="10"&col="736562"Switching maps cancels this effect and sets it on cooldown, losing all accumulated Drop Chance.
The Drop Chance increase is capped at &type="bold_it"&col="FFE770"125%.
